title: 1998 Valley Fab 8-Station Lettuce Machine Harvester with Double Conveyor Arms and 4-Chain Deck for Cartons
item_description:
1998 Valley Fab 8-Station Lettuce Machine Harvester with Double Conveyor Arms and 4-Chain Deck for Cartons

NOTE: The sale of this harvester is subject to the Seller's confirmation.

  • Make: Valley Fab
  • Tire Size: 14.9-24
  • Open width: 42’3”
  • Conveyor length: 173”
  • Height: 125”
  • Deck Length: 246”
  • Closed length: 28’
  • Hours: 17684
